summary.para: Retrieves the input trust authority (ITA) for a specified stream.

param.name: dwStreamID
param.para: The stream identifier for which the ITA is being requested.

param.name: riid
param.para: The interface identifier (IID) of the interface being requested. Currently the only supported value is IID_IMFInputTrustAuthority.

param.name: ppunkObject
param.para: Receives a pointer to the ITA's IUnknown interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The ITA does not expose the requested interface.

summary.para: Implemented by components that provide input trust authorities (ITAs). This interface is used to get the ITA for each of the component's streams.
